cps.entities.models

Class Complaint

  • java.lang.Object
    • cps.entities.models.Complaint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Complaint
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a customer complaint as a data object that can be sent through the network and persisted in the database.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • update

        public void update(java.sql.Connection conn)
            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Update (save to database) an existing complaint entry. Shortcut method for a full update.
        Parameters:
        conn - the SQL connection
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - on error

      • update

        public void update(java.sql.Connection conn,
                   boolean light)
            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Update (save to database) an existing complaint entry. Light update - write all fields except complaint description Full update - write all fields, including description
        Parameters:
        conn - the SQL connection
        light - is it a light update, or a full update
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - on error
